content: आयुज् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> or {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To join, fasten or tie, yoke (to anything). {@--2@} To appoint. {@--3@} To fix or direct (the mind) towards; आयोजितस्तपस्यात्मा <ls>K. 173.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To fix, or place; <ls>Rs. 2. 21.</ls> {@--2@} To make or form; कुसुमायोजितकार्मुको मधुः <ls>Ku. 4. 24.</ls>
